Package io.codefine.onequery

package io.codefine.onequery
  • Related Packages

    Description

  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    OneQueryCollectStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    Interface casts the result to a specific collection, which are terminal methods
    OneQueryFetchStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    The interface repeats the logic of returning values from the ResultQuery interface and allows you to use Jooq types as the return value.
    OneQueryFilterStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    Interface allowing access to filtering methods
    OneQueryFromStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    An auxiliary interface that helps to assemble a valid request.
    OneQueryOnStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    Helper interface, used to add a key to join tables if it was not added in the original query query
    OneQueryOptionalPaginationStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    An intermediate interface that represents a common step for some interfaces.
    OneQueryPaginationResultStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    The interface results in PaginationResult, which are terminal methods
    OneQueryPaginationStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    An interface containing pagination methods returns the following step: OneQueryPaginationResultStep.
    OneQuerySortStep<R extends org.jooq.Record>
    Interface allowing access to sorting methods
